course.subject: MARK
course.name: The Art and Science of Digital and Direct Marketing
course.description: This course will provide an in-depth look at the scientific foundations of digital and direct marketing, including strategic planning, tactical execution, testing strategies and tactics, the relationship and value of media/offer/creative, the weighted values of recency/frequency/monetary value, and other proven, scientific methods for practitioners. It will also examine the "art" of this discipline, examining and analyzing the leverage this brings to the overall equation of digital and direct marketing.
